about_the_game:
Create Your Own Esports Club

In this game, you’ll assemble and manage your own professional esports team. Recruit players from a vast pool of talent, schedule their training, and help them hone their skills. Immerse yourself in the joy of guiding your team from humble beginnings to dominating the world stage.

A Dual Challenge of Strategy and Management

Managing a team isn’t easy. You’ll face relentless challenges: financial struggles, failed investments, coaches resigning, and players leaving... How will you navigate this thorny path?

Fate's Gifts and Trials

But it’s not all hardship – luck may smile upon you with unexpected windfalls, help from friends, romantic confessions, or the favor of investors. Can you hold onto your passion for esports amidst these twists of fate?

Control the Fate of Your Team and Life

Will your team claim the championship crown or withdraw in disappointment? Will you live a life of wealth and splendor, or fall into debt and face bankruptcy? Will you find lasting love or lose yourself in fleeting pleasures?

The outcome of your journey depends entirely on your decisions. Where will the wheel of fate stop?
